title: The Christmas Movie Circle!
detail_text: <:th_ch0001/>Wow! Look at this, Kanan-san! The street’s all lit up with Christmas lights!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>It’s so pretty~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Seeing this makes me really feel the Christmas spirit~. Speaking of which, recently we watched a Christmas movie together!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>A Christmas movie? What was it about?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>So on Christmas day, a young boy gets left home alone, and a couple of burglars enter his house...<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Sounds like a pretty grim movie.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>No, not at all~! The boy plays a bunch of pranks on the burglars to defend the house. It was really funny~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Oh, I see. I kinda want to see it too. Could you tell me what the movie was called?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Of course! I’ll text it to you later.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Thanks. I’ll watch it with everyone in Aqours later!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
